HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
The mod setting of Bill Doors' weapon jams has underwent a major overhaul, which would require you to press the reset button in the mod settings or set it yourself, otherwise weapon jam chances can behave weirdly.

Other changes includes:
-Make chance sliders works in an order of ^1.5, making it easier to fine tune the last 10%.
-Greatly decreased and reworked weapon hitpoint penalty, with more sliders in mod settings.
-Better visibility of weapon jam chance instead of hidding in a black box, now you can see weapon jam chance in info panel and when a weapon jams.
-Optional behaviour of weapons damaging user's hand when it breaks from jams.
-Fixed a red-letter when weapon breaks in CE.
-Fixed a red-letter when one switchs from vanilla to CE, a side effect of major code clean up.
